price: ‘বৰং তুমি কেৱল আল্লাহৰেই ইবাদত কৰা আৰু কৃতজ্ঞসকলৰ অন্তৰ্ভুক্ত হোৱা’।
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
